snippet: Coleman Scott defeated Shawn Bunch in a wrestle-off in Times Square Thursday night to earn the final spot on the United States Olympic freestyle wrestling team.
abstract: Coleman Scott defeats Shawn Bunch in a wrestle-off in Times Square for the last spot on United States Olympic freestyle team.
lead_paragraph: Coleman Scott defeated Shawn Bunch in a wrestle-off in Times Square Thursday night to earn the final spot on the United States Olympic freestyle wrestling team.

headline.seo: Wrestle-Off in Times Square Decides Final Olympic Roster Spot
headline.main: Wrestle-Off in Times Square Decides Final Olympic Roster Spot
headline.print_headline: Beginning Final Leg of Long Road to London
